mapper.select: select current_value from xqua_batch_result_rule xbrr where xbrr.plan_field_line_id = #{planFieldLineId} and rule_type = '${@com.hand.hdsp.quality.infra.constant.PlanConstant$ResultRuleType@FIELD}' and date_format(creation_date, '%Y%m%d') = date_format(#{measureDate}, '%Y%m%d') order by xbrr.creation_date desc

select CASE WHEN xbrr.warning_level IS NOT NULL THEN xbrr.warning_level ELSE '${@com.hand.hdsp.quality.infra.constant.PlanConstant@WARNING_LEVEL_NORMAL}' END warning_level, CASE WHEN xbpt.weight IS NOT NULL THEN xbpt.weight WHEN xbpf.weight IS NOT NULL THEN xbpf.weight ELSE xbprt.weight END weight from xqua_batch_result_rule xbrr left join xqua_batch_plan_table xbpt on xbrr.rule_id = xbpt.plan_table_id and xbrr.rule_type = '${@com.hand.hdsp.quality.infra.constant.PlanConstant$ResultRuleType@TABLE}' left join xqua_batch_plan_field xbpf on xbrr.rule_id = xbpf.plan_field_id and xbrr.rule_type = '${@com.hand.hdsp.quality.infra.constant.PlanConstant$ResultRuleType@FIELD}' left join xqua_batch_plan_rel_table xbprt on xbrr.rule_id = xbprt.plan_rel_table_id and xbrr.rule_type = '${@com.hand.hdsp.quality.infra.constant.PlanConstant$ResultRuleType@REL_TABLE}' join xqua_batch_result_base xbrb on xbrr.result_base_id = xbrb.result_base_id join xqua_batch_result xbr on xbrb.result_id = xbr.result_id where xbr.result_id = #{resultId}
